name: Fighting Chance
description:
Corned with a Mayan curse you must kill dice or die trying!

Instructions:

You can kill dice with the same or lower number than you - But! The higher your number the slower you are. Bombs do not hurt you - use them to reroll you or your enemy.

Live leaderboard! Will you get the high score before Jam voting ends?

Controls

MoveWASDAimMouseFireLeft clickDrop and active bombRight click

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam - theme: roll the dice
